#Text=Be Lucky on Friday the 13th
#Text=Friday the 13th is supposedly an ominous date , steeped in superstition and assumed by some to bring bad luck .

#Text=But if you 're more inclined to turn the tables and make Friday the 13th your super lucky day , while there 's no forcing luck , a good attitude and a relaxed approach to daily life on Friday the 13th might just bring you some much needed fun and excitement .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Be good luck-oriented .
#Text=There are a few superstitions aimed at bringing you luck that you might like to try :
#Text=Get out of the bed on the right side ( that is , not the left side ) .
#Text=This side is guaranteed to make your day luckier according to some superstitions .
#Text=If you ca n't get out on that side because it is next to the wall or for another reason , just skip this step .
#Text=Wear red underpants .
#Text=Apparently this color will bring you more luck than other colors .
#Text=Whatever you do , do n't choose green underpants or luck might abandon you .
#Text=Get your most trusted lucky charm out .
#Text=Place it in your pocket and wear it all day .
#Text=Forget the cleaning .

#Text=Few need to be told this most days but Friday the 13th is a great excuse because apparently handling a broom is unlucky on this day , as is changing the sheets , flipping the mattress , or doing the laundry .
#Text=So forget the cleaning and just enjoy your day .
#Text=Think positively all day .
#Text=Make this the day to put aside bad moods , irritability , and your ongoing petty argument with a co-worker or family member .
#Text=This is the day for choosing good things , good thoughts , and good outcomes .
#Text=Indeed , not believing in bad luck is a good approach because research has shown that people who believe in bad luck tend to bring it on !
#Text=Tell everyone that 13 is your lucky number .
#Text=Let them know how excited you are that the date has fallen on the 13th again , and that you expect this to be a great day .
#Text=Test your luck .
#Text=Go out and deliberately do a few things that involve chance and where your luck takes you .
#Text=Buy a lottery ticket for the next big draw , buy some scratch tickets , play a game at the casino , or place some sports bets .
#Text=If you 're too young to gamble , or dislike it , play some games of chance at home with friends and guess who is going to win , or watch a game on TV and guess who will win .
#Text=Apply for a new job you 've really been wanting .
#Text=Realize that the very superstitious do n't all think that Friday 13th is a good day to start anything new , not even opening a new packet of cereal .
#Text=But why not turn that superstition on its head and do something to force Lady Luck 's hand ?
#Text=Today could be the day luck sways your way !
#Text=Organize something fun to do after work , studies , or other duties .
#Text=Mark the day by celebrating and having fun with your friends .
#Text=Go to a concert , eat out , visit a bar , watch a show in the park , etc. Just use the day as an excuse to party !
#Text=Think about how lucky you are .
#Text=Spend a little part of your day counting your blessings .
#Text=What are all the things you 're grateful for in your life ?
#Text=Who are the people in your life that matter most to you ?
#Text=What would n't you change about your life for all the world ?
#Text=Remind yourself of all the people , opportunities , and things that make you feel lucky in your life whenever you feel a sense of impending doom about anything !
#Text=Dispense with the superstitious nonsense and take responsibility for the things that happen to you .
#Text=If you carry on thinking about luck all day , you 're likely to be distracted and possibly something less-than-lucky might happen .
#Text=Eyes open , head up , and brain in charge !

#Text=Moreover , psychologist Richard Wiseman who carried out the study on believing in bad luck mentioned earlier , suggested that believing in superstitions can actually be a way of avoiding taking responsibility for your own failings .

#Text=So perhaps this is as good a day as any to re-examine any loopy superstitions you might have inherited through the grapevine of folk gossip and finally take a stand to let logic rule your concerns rather than fears and half truths .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Luck is usually the result of effort and common sense combined .
#Text=Sometimes people choose to see things as lucky because they were unexpected ; if your entire life is full of the unexpected though , it 's probably time to reassess your gullibility .
#Text=To make 13 be your lucky number , you need to see that number a lot .
#Text=If you play a sport , have 13 be your jersey number .
#Text=If you think of other ways , go ahead and use it .
#Text=Pet a black cat .
#Text=The luck has to go somewhere , right ?
#Text=Better still , give it some cat treats or catnip .
#Text=Any other color of cat helps too , just close your eyes and scratch , listen for the purr .
#Text=Do n't do this if the cat hisses or walks away , let the cat decide how much affection it wants .
#Text=Consider adopting a black cat or kitten from a shelter - they face terrible discrimination from the superstitious .
#Text=It still counts if it 's got white mittens or tuxedo markings .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=The marking out of Friday the 13th as a day of concern is superstition .
#Text=Feeling lucky or unlucky on this date is a superstitious action .
#Text=Nothing is guaranteed either way but you are the master or mistress of your own destiny , so use your common sense and rein in your illusions .
#Text=Things You 'll Need
#Text=Party plans
#Text=Red underwear
